about_the_game:
Many thanks to the many talented musicians whose music we used to breathe life into the corridors of the ancient labyrinth!
Without your wonderful music, Palladium: Adventure in Greece would be a completely different game.

All of these tracks can be downloaded for free from sites whose addresses you can find in the "Credits" section of the main menu. We did it for you, and now you can just enjoy the music.

This soundtrack uses the music of the following authors:
  • C.Gspan
  • CleytonKauffman
  • Alexandr Zhelanov
  • HitCtrl
  • Type 42
  • hc
  • Manakade
  • Gundatsch
  • Anonymous Fix
  • brandon75689
  • The Cynic Project
  • SouljahdeShiva
  • Rasmus Damsgaard
  • Brandon Morris
